title: Peacekeepers wounded by Israeli fire in Lebanon, U.N. says, as tensions rise
content: Israeli forces have fired at three U.N. positions in the south of Lebanon over the past 24 hours, the United Nations said Thursday. The IDF had no immediate comment.
summary: Israeli forces have fired at three U.N. positions in the south of Lebanon over the past 24 hours, the United Nations said Thursday. The IDF had no immediate comment.

title: Boris Johnson just published his political memoir. It’s unbelievable.
content: The former British prime minister’s book “Unleashed” has made minor news. But British readers seem to be viewing it more as entertainment than history.
summary: The former British prime minister’s book “Unleashed” has made minor news. But British readers seem to be viewing it more as entertainment than history.

Earth’s wildlife populations have disappeared at a ‘catastrophic’ rate in the past half-century, new analysis says
content: The Living Planet Index tracks thousands of vertebrate species globally and found the worst declines were in Latin America and the Caribbean.
summary: The Living Planet Index tracks thousands of vertebrate species globally and found the worst declines were in Latin America and the Caribbean.

title: X is back online in Brazil, but it’s still a defeat for Musk
